meanings.definition: Enroll again in a course or program.
meanings.sent1: After taking a break, she reenrolled in the math class.
meanings.sent2: He decided to reenroll in the art course for the next semester.
meanings.sent3: The student accidentally reenrolled in the wrong chemistry class.
meanings.sent4: She reenrolled in the dance program, ready to twirl into the new term.
meanings.sent5: The young man eagerly reenrolled in the coding bootcamp to enhance his skills.

meanings.definition: Register or sign up for a class or program again.
meanings.sent1: She reenrolled in the music lessons after a brief hiatus.
meanings.sent2: The athlete decided to reenroll in the fitness training program.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly reenrolled in the cooking class for the third time.
meanings.sent4: The actor reenrolled in the acting workshop, eager to refine his craft.
meanings.sent5: After a year off, she reenrolled in the language course to continue learning.
